error.current: The date of birth must be in the past.
error.invalid: The date of birth must be valid in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD (Year-Month-Day).
error.required: The date of birth is required.

date-of-birth.label: Date of birth, as you detailed on the application

check-again: Check the status of another application
description: Fill in the fields below to check the status of your passport application. Make sure your information matches your passport application form.

esrf.help-message: If you can't find your file number or reference number, you can <Link>request to receive it</Link>.
esrf.label: File number or reference number

given-name.label: Given name(s), as you detailed on the application
given-name.help-message: Enter first name(s) and any middle name(s).

previous: Check the status of another application
reset: Check the status of another application
header: Get the status of your passport application

1.label: Being processed
1.description: Your application has been received and is in progress. If any further information is required, we will contact you.

2.label: Issued and Ready for Pickup
2.description: Your passport will be issued and ready for pick-up on your scheduled pick-up date. You must wait until your scheduled pick-up date to pick up your passport. Your passport pick-up date will show on your pick-up receipt.

3.label: Issued and Shipping Canada Post
3.description: Your passport has been issued and shipped using Canada Post. Please note that any documents you provided to support your passport application will be shipped to you separately.
3.tracking: You can track this shipment on Canada Post's website using the tracking code:

4.label: Issued and Shipping Fedex
4.description: Your passport has been issued and shipped using FedEx. Please note that any documents you provided to support your passport application will be shipped to you separately.
4.tracking: You can track this shipment on FedEx's website using the tracking code:

5.label: Not acceptable for processing
5.description: We reviewed your application and you will receive further communication by mail or by phone from the Passport Program.

99.label: Application No Longer Meets Criteria for Use
99.description: If you're seeing this then something has gone wrong.

status-is: The latest status of your application according to our records is:

surname.label: Surname, as you detailed on the application

cannot-provide-result.title: We cannot provide a result at this time because:
cannot-provide-result.reason1: the information you provided does not match the information in our system;
cannot-provide-result.reason2: we have not yet received your application; or
cannot-provide-result.reason3: we have received your application but have not yet started processing it.

cannot-give-status.description: We can't give you the application status right now
cannot-give-status.because: The status of your passport is not available because:

list.item-1: the information you gave us doesn't match the information in our system or
list.item-2: we received the application, but haven't started processing it yet

no-record.contact-us: If you can't get the application status using this tool, or if the application is taking longer than the <Link>service standard</Link>, please <Link2>contact us</Link2>.
no-record.can-review: You can review the information you entered and try again.
no-record.cant-find-file: If we still can't find the file, you can try again tomorrow. We update our records daily.
no-record.need-faster: If you need the passport faster
no-record.get-urgent: Find out how to get <Link>urgent or express service for existing applications</Link> if you need the passport within 10 business days. Extra fees may apply.

being-processed.received: We have received your application and are now processing it
being-processed.we-will-contact: If we need more information, we'll contact you by telephone, mail, or email. We will never use text or instant messages to contact you about your passport application.
being-processed.ready-within: If your application has been duly completed, your passport should be ready within our <Link>service standards</Link>.
being-processed.incomplete: Incomplete applications cannot be processed and will be returned to you as soon as possible.
being-processed.need-faster: If you need the passport faster
being-processed.get-urgent: Find out how to get <Link>urgent or express service for existing applications</Link> if you need the passport within 10 business days. Extra fees may apply.
being-processed.dont-meet-standards: If we don't meet our service standards
being-processed.may-be-eligible: You may be eligible for a partial refund if we don't meet our <Link>service standards</Link>.

ready-for-pickup.check-receipt: Check your receipt for pick-up instructions
ready-for-pickup.receipt-details: Your receipt details the date and location that you should pick-up your passport.
ready-for-pickup.not-available: Your passport will not be available before the pick-up date printed on your receipt.
ready-for-pickup.date-passed: If your pick-up date has passed, you can go in anytime to pick up your passport.

shipped-canada-post.header: Your passport has been printed and mailed
shipped-canada-post.mailing: We're mailing it to you by Canada Post
shipped-canada-post.take-up-to: It can take up to 2 to 3 business days to arrive.
shipped-canada-post.remote-area: If you live in a northern or remote area, it may take up to 8 business days to arrive.
shipped-canada-post.supporting-documents: We may send your supporting documents back separately.

shipped-fedex.header: Your passport has been printed and couriered to you
shipped-fedex.mailing: We're sending it to you by FedEx®
shipped-fedex.supporting-documents: You'll receive your passport and supporting documents in the same envelope.
shipped-fedex.take-up-to: It can take up to 5 to 7 business days to arrive.
shipped-fedex.contact-us: If you don't receive your passport and supporting documents, <Link>contact us</Link>.

not-acceptable.cannot-process: We've reviewed your application and can't process it further
not-acceptable.explanation: We're sending you a letter explaining why and will return your supporting documents at the same time.

status-check-contact.call-us: Call us toll free at {{phoneNumber}} if your application is taking longer than the service standard

status-check-urgent.description: If you need the passport within 10 business days, learn <Link>how to get urgent or express service for your existing application</Link>

status-check-call: <Link>Contact us</Link> if you don't receive your documents within 4 weeks of receiving your passport.

header-messages.matches: Make sure your information matches the proof of citizenship and supporting ID used when you applied for a passport. Your proof of citizenship could be one of the following:

list.item-4: other documents, like a naturalization certificate

child-applications.description: Use the child's given name(s), surname and date of birth, exactly as provided on their proof of citizenship.
